title: Provides exemption for first time home buyer from a mortgage or recording tax imposed by a municipality
summary: Provides exemption for first time home buyer from a mortgage or recording tax imposed by a municipality pursuant to article 11 of the tax law; directs commissioner of taxation and finance to establish qualifications and procedures for obtaining such exemption.
actClause: AN ACT to amend the tax law, in relation to an exemption from municipal mortgage tax for first time home buyers
